summary: An ordinance granting permission to Moritz Thomsen et al, to improve the north half of the alley in block 112, Terry's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle being the alley bounded by Madison Street, Marion Street, Terry Avenue and Boren Avenue, by grading and paving and planking the same, with suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, at their own cost and expense in accordance with plans to be prepared by the city engineer.
